title: Dragon Ball Legends Tier List
description: Discover the best characters in Dragon Ball Legends with our comprehensive tier list, ranking fighters from S to C Tier. Learn which heroes to use for maximum impact in battles.
heading: Dragon Ball Legends Tier List
introText: Discover the best characters in Dragon Ball Legends with our comprehensive tier list, ranking fighters from S to C Tier. Learn which heroes to use for maximum impact in battles.

data.itemDescription: Do not underestimate this character based on what you have seen in the series. Yamcha is a reliable character in DBL and can restore health and achieve 100% ki recovery. Put this character in a team with elements BLU and PUR and characters with the Saiyan Saga (Z) tag
Both SP Goku and SP Yamcha were released at the same time, and they make a great duo in a team. Works in synergy with both Saiyan Saga (Z) and Saiyan tag characters
One of the best fighters under the green element. He is known for his massive damage output. His synergy works on these two tags: Power Opponent and Sagas from the Movies
Yes, the kid Goku from the GT series. He works great in a team with any of the GT characters and also has synergy with both the Saiyan and Son Family tags. Overall, great support

Another duo card that made it to the list. Switch between Goku and Frieza while also being able to change the element to blue. Put them on a team with the Universe Rep, Saiyan, and Lineage of Evil tags
The goku from the Frieza Saga. He is a powerful character and has great synergy with Saiyan, the Son Family, and the Frieza Saga (Z) tags
A hybrid saiyan is once again on the list. Put her in a team of Sagas from the Movies, Hybrid Saiyan or the Son Family tags to get great support
Android 17 from the survival saga. Like in the series, he is a powerful character in DBL too and works great in a team of Universe Rep, Android, and Universe Survival Saga tags
A decent character with decent damage output. He can regenerate and is a transforming warrior. He works well with character tags: Regeneration and Sagas from the Movies only

data.itemName: UL Super Saiyan God SS Gogeta (Purple)
data.itemDescription: A fusion warrior who can inflict decent enough damage. He is an attack character and has synergy with just a couple of tags: Fusion Warrior and Saiyan
Use this character to support your team with the element red and tags with Son Family and Hybrid Saiyan. For example: Beast Gohan or Android 17 from the Z+ tier
Use alongside characters from the Universe Survival Saga and element red
